thread.title: Clinton makes gay rights as a core promise of 2016 campaign
thread.title_full: Clinton makes gay rights as a core promise of 2016 campaign

title: Clinton makes gay rights as a core promise of 2016 campaign
text:
> Political Clinton makes gay rights as a core promise of 2016 campaign Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Rodham Clinton shake hands with supporters after speaking to the Human Rights Campaign in Washington, Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015.
